name: Before The Dawn (KenleyPan)
description:
A Roguelite top-down shooter. Fight your way out of the zombie tide!

The game is still in an development, but you can play the alpha!

Besides the html version, you can also download the Windows version. Their content is the same.

If you have any suggestions, welcome to leave a message.

Controls:

● W,S,A,D—Move   

● LMB—Fire  

● E—Vehicle

Fight your way through the hordes of zombies and get rescued in this zombie-infested city night!

Unique Builds Every Run

In this roguelite survival game, select from a variety of upgrades to create a unique and overpowered builds every run. You need to activate several signal towers for rescue, You can become a warrior and fight your way out, or try to avoid the enemy to achieve your goal.

Select Characters And Weapons

Choose from a diverse selection of characters and weapons that offer a variety of gameplay experiences.

Survival And Exploration

Destroy enemies, upgrade your weapons, drive vehicles to find signal towers, and use various means to achieve your goals!

Features

· Over 50 different upgrades to choose from for a unique experience every run.
· Destructible environments and drivable vehicles.
· Various characters and weapons.
· Casual quick 10-20 minute play sessions, for busy gamers.
· Gift System helps you become stronger
